Literature Review: The study of ancient viral genomes has revolutionized our understanding of human history, providing a unique window into the past. By analyzing the genetic material of ancient human remains, researchers have been able to identify and characterize viruses that have been extinct for thousands of years. This has significant implications for our understanding of the evolution of the human lineage and the impact of past epidemics on human populations.
